articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Visit Mangyongdae and Martyrs' Cemetery
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Visit Mangyongdae and Martyrs' Cemetery
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of Youth Day visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They put bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, in Mangyongdae and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 They went to the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum to go round historic relics and materials, looking back on the patriotic and revolutionary life of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae who devoted their all to the country and the people. 
					
					 Then they moved to the old home where they looked round historic relics showing the noble traits of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Their next stop was the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They placed bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, and paid tribute to her.
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in memory of anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs who devoted their all to the sacred struggle for the liberation of the country and freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					 They looked round the busts of anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs.

articles.title: U.S. Army Secretary's Visit to S. Korea Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Army Secretary's Visit to S. Korea Slammed 
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. secretary of the Army paid an unofficial visit to south Korea. He held a secret discussion with traitor Kim Kwan Jin, "minister of Defence" of south Korea, on the U.S. new defence strategy and the "recent movements" of the DPRK.
					 Then, he went to the U.S. military base in Ryongsan to examine the preparation for the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with military officers of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea and the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 The warmonger even appeared at Panmunjom, fanning up a war fever. Covering this fact, the U.S. and the south Korean military loudly claimed that the U.S. secretary of the Army came to south Korea to "contain provocation", while raising a hue and cry over the "examination of deterrent forces to cope with the north".
					
					 Papers Sunday in bylined commentaries say that this is nothing but a deceptive farce of warmongers, describing the U.S. secretary of the Army's visit to south Korea as a war visit of provocateur and aggressor, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 His visit to south Korea in the run up to the start of the joint military drills bears a close resemblance to the inspection of the 38th parallel by Dulles as a special envoy of the U.S. president on the eve of the Korean war, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:.
					
					 The nature of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors was brought to light once again as foul traitor and heinous warmonger who makes desperate efforts to escalate the confrontation with compatriots as a despicable war servant of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can gain something in posing a military threat and kicking off large-scale saber-rattling in collusion.
					
					 Provocateurs and war maniacs will meet shameful destruction.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the U.S. secretary of the Army's unofficial visit to south Korea is aimed to reexamine the long-prepared scenario for a war against the north in the field and issue an order for a war by giving a shot in the arm of the warmongers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. for Instability on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. for Instability on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is becoming all the more reckless in blackmailing the DPRK by force of arms, coiling up tension on the Korean Peninsula, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined article.
					 The U.S. claims that it has no hostility to the DPRK but it is watching for a chance to invade the DPRK, sharpening a sword of aggression, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. foolish intention is to drive the situation on the peninsula to the worst phase so as to attain its sordid aim of invading the DPRK, and finally create favorable conditions for carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. ever-escalating hostile policy to stifle the DPRK precisely means the policy to put region under its control for its world domination strategy.
					
					 It is the U.S. view that if it seizes the whole Korean Peninsula, it can put under its control the major strategic areas of the Western Europe, Middle East, Central Asia and Northeast Asia and thus encircle Eurasia from all sides.
					
					 The U.S. is planning to fight another Korean war as a last operation of laying an overall military siege to the Eurasian continent.  
					
					 Accordingly, it is regularly holding the DPRK-targeted military drills with the south Korean warmongers with a firm hold on south Korea, escalating the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 To smash the U.S. imperialists' moves to provoke a new war is an important and pressing issue to ensure the peace and security in the peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 If the enemies dare fire even a single shell into the territory of the DPRK, it will deal immediate deadly counter-strikes at them to develop them to a sacred war for reunifying the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was carried by the 31st issue of the Russian paper Patriot.
					 The work published on July 26, 2012 clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his life characterized by love for country and people.
					
					 It also indicates the important matters for embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The paper carried a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and a portrait of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Songun Politics Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Songun Politics Lauded Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Meeting, seminar, lecture and film show were held in Bulgaria, Myanmar, Guinea and Nigeria on August 16 and 17 on the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The president of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the chairman and secretary general of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union at a seminar said that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the destiny of the country, revolution, socialism and nation, pursuing Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people are invariably advancing along the road of socialism and Songun, holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as DPRK Marshal, and they will certainly achieve the final victory, meeting all challenges of the imperialists and those forces kowtowing to them, they added.
					
					 The general director for Administrative Affairs of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited said at a meeting that the DPRK could have invincible and powerful military capacities under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and is successfully protecting the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the people.
					
					 The director expressed belief that the people of the DPRK would surely accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation and national reunification under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University of Guinea at a lecture said the DPRK is defending and glorifying its sovereignty and dignity by dint of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il while taking the lead of the progressive people in their efforts for global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh issued the bulletin "Immortal Songun exploits" on Aug. 17 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership on August 25, 1960.
					
					 He steered the cause of Songun, putting the military capacity of the country on the highest level.
					
					 His Songun leadership turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power which has achieved single-minded unity.
					
					 There were many leaders in history who allegedly worked for the people but no one passed away in the middle of field guidance for their happiness like Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His idea was to build a thriving socialist country with great national power where everything is prosperous and its people are well off with no more to desire in the world. 
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is invariably carrying forward the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries carried special write-ups to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Cambodian paper Kmae Amata on Aug. 20 carried an article titled "Immortal Exploits of Songun" with a photo of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un among soldiers of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership ushered in the new era of prosperity unprecedented in the Korean nation's history spanning 5 000 years, adding that the KPA developed to be a matchless army under his guidance.
					
					 State Radio of Cambodia on Aug. 18 reported that Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the cause of Songun pioneered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Nepalese newspaper Jana Sata on Aug. 20 carried an article praising the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great man under the title of "Modern Korea and the Songun revolutionary leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise on Aug. 17 carried an article titled "On the 52nd anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership" with his smiling portrait.
					
					 The Aug. 18th issue of the Indian paper Defence and Humanity carried articles titled "Songun Korea" and "Footprints of devotion" with his photo.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Immortal exploits of Songun" said that he put the DPRK's military capacity on the highest level with his Songun leadership.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia and the internal secretary of the Central Committee of the League of the Yugoslavian Communist Youth issued a joint statement on Aug. 20 as regards Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.
					 They expressed serious concern over the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula again due to UFG.
					
					 They urged the U.S. imperialists and south Korea to immediately stop UFG and roll back their anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 They were convinced that no force on earth can match the might of the Korean people closely united around the great Songun brilliant commander, adding that they will always stand by the Korean people for independence, peace and reunification.
					
					 They called on the world progressives to extend firm support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people in unity.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, in a statement on Aug. 21 harshly condemned UFG, urging the U.S. and its followers to face up to the situation and immediately stop their reckless military provocations going against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Urged
articles.content:
Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Urged
						
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association released a statement on Aug. 20 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises for aggression.
					 UFG rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea claim that UFG is an "annual drill for defence". But there is no doubt that it is a drill for a war against the DPRK and the declaration of a war.
					
					 The world peace-loving and progressive forces are accusing the U.S. and south Korea of UFG that destroys peace and stability on the peninsula, and are urging them to immediately stop it.
					
					 The statement called on the world peace-loving forces to positively take part in the international signature campaign for averting a war on the peninsula and having a peace agreement signed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Bada Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Bada Moranbong 
						
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, quien estaba en el camino de inspeccion a la parte oriental al frente, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio la funcion de la Banda Moranbong que se ofrecia en el frente por el 25 de agosto - 52o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il  sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					El mariscal junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju aparecio en la graderia.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Chang Sop y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el ejercito, los miembros de mando de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y de cohetes estrategicos del EPC, los comandantes de las unidades combinadas de la parte oriental del frente, los aviadores y las militares de la compania Kamnamu (caqui).
					
					En la funcion iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional se pusieron diversas piezas tales como la musica ligera y cancion "Vencedores", la musica ligera "Mirennos", el cuarteto femenino "Partido es madre" y el sexteto femenino "Cantamos el partido".
					
					Las ejecutantes la describieron con emocion que gracias a las magnas proezas del Dirigente          Kim Jong Il, quien al practicar la politica de Songun defendio el destino de la patria y la nacion y convirtio la Corea socialista en potencia invencible, se han preparado la gran tradicion y patrimonio de la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun, vaso sanguineo de la Corea de Kim Il Sung.
					
					La escena y los asientos estaban llenos de emocion y jubilo por el temperamento revolucionario y combativo de la funcion en que estaban ensamblados todos los elementos descriptivos y creativos de la musica.
					
					Cuando sonaba el sexteto femenino "Cancion de las artilleras costeras", las militares de la compania Kamnamu se sumaron a cantar en la escena mostrando el coraje de dar castigo duro a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos que desarrollan con frenesi los ejercicios de guerra para bloquear nuestro avance.
					
					El Comandante Supremo envio la caliente bendicion a las militares de la compania Kamnamu mostrandoles el dedo pulgar.
					
					En la escena se pusieron las recien creadas canciones: el solo femenino y Pangchang "Cojin de oro", el cuarteto femenino "Adelante para el futuro" y el duo femenino y Pangchang "Seamos raices".
					
					La funcion llego al climax cuando aparecio en la pantalla su imagen acompanada de la nueva cancion "Deseo ardiente", interpretada por solo femenino y Pangchang en reflejo del alma de todos los militares y civiles coreanos quienes desean la buena salud al Mariscal quien continua el camino al frente.
					
					La funcion termino con la interpretacion del sexteto femenino "Nuestro Dirigente adorado por el pueblo".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en banquete conmemorativo del 25 de agosto
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en banquete conmemorativo del 25 de agosto
						
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron un banquete de conmemoracion del dia 25 de agosto - el 52o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					Participo en la ocasion el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea quien se encuentra en el camino de inspeccion a la parte oriental del frente.
					
					Cuando el Mariscal aparecio en el salon de banquetes junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju, todos los participantes les dieron una calurosa bienvenida con el maximo honor y el agradecimiento mas ferviente al Comandante  Supremo, quien encargandose del destino de la patria y la nacion estaba en el camino de inspeccion al frente frustrando categoricamente las maniobras de los enemigos encaminadas a provocar una nueva guerra.
					
					En la recepcion el Comandante Supremo pronuncio un discurso.
					
					En la comida estuvieron presentes  los miembros del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC y del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, los miembros de mando de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas, antiaereas y de cohetes estrategicos del EPC, asi como los comandantes de las unidades combinadas del frente oriental.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en banquete por el 25 de agosto
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en banquete por el 25 de agosto
						
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Mariscal   Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso en el banquete ofrecido por el 25 de agosto.
					En un dia como hoy de hace 52 anos, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il dio el primer paso de su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, comenzo el Mariscal.
					
					Prosiguio que brillaran de generacion en generacion las hazanas de Kim Jong Il quien elevo al plano mas alto de la historia nacional la dignidad de nuestra patria y pueblo, al preparar las invencibles fuerzas armadas y el poderio de la gran unidad entre los militares y civiles, envidiados por todo el mundo, trabajando abnegadamente en toda su vida bajo la bandera del Songun y con el amor por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					En representacion de la voluntad unanime de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo coreano, rindo el mas sublime homenaje y gloria eterna al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, quien dedico todo lo suyo a la causa del Songun, caracterizada por la abnegacion por la patria y el pueblo, viviendo con pasion y carino, recordo.
					
					Celebramos aqui en el frente este dia significativo junto con los companeros de armas del frente oriental justamente cuando los enemigos libran con frenesi los ejercicios de la guerra de agresion en las mismas narices de la RPDC, apunto.
					
					Al igual que el 25 de abril (dia de fundacion del EPC), el 25 de agosto es fecha historica que se registrara para siempre en la historia de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea y en los anales de la patria, senalo y agrego que estan vinculados directamente con esa fecha el poderio del EPC, honrado hoy como ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, y el gallardo aspecto de la patria hecha una potencia militar de talla mundial y digno portador de arma nuclear.
					
					Expreso la firme decision y voluntad del PTC de defender la seguridad de la patria y las conquistas de la revolucion y edificar en esta tierra un Estado prospero reunificado empunando mas fuerte los fusiles del Songun, preparados a costa de ingentes trabajos del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien estuvo en toda su vida en el camino de direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					En estos dias, Estados Unidos y el ejercito titere surcoreano libran con las fuerzas seguidoras los ejercicios de guerra de gran envergadura contra la RPDC amenazando gravemente nuestra seguridad, denuncio el Comandante Supremo y prosiguio:
					
					Durante mi estancia en las unidades en la primera linea del frente sudoeste, ya ordene a todo el ejercito que vigilara agudamente las acciones imprudentes de los enemigos manteniendose en el estado de alerta, asestara un inmediato y demoledor contraataque si ellos envian una sola rafaga a nuestro territorio y mar jurisdiccionales y pasara luego a la contraofensiva total para cumplir la gran causa de reunificacion de la patria. Ademas, he examinado el plan operacional correspondiente y lo he firmado en definitiva.
					
					En estos momentos, los valientes oficiales y soldados del EPC, que recibieron mi orden, ocuparon las trincheras de combate frente a las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos para desatar la guerra y estan esperando la orden final de avance para librar el combate de vida o muerte con los enemigos.
					
					Nuestra paciencia tambien tiene limite.
					
					"!Responder a la provocacion con el inmediato contraataque y a la guerra de agresion, con la justa guerra por la reunificacion de la patria!", esto es la posicion de principios y la firme voluntad de la RPDC.
					
					No nos quedaremos con brazos cruzados ante las demenciales maniobras agresivas de los enemigos y haremos todo lo que este a nuestro alcance para defender el destino del pais y la nacion.
					
					Nadie puede detener a un pueblo levantado en su justa causa, esto es la verdad comprobada por la historia.
					
					Si se desata nuevamente en esta tierra la guerra, que no deseamos, como consecuencia de las acciones imperdonables y abominables de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, ellos sufriran la destruccion vergonzosa y la gran nacion coreana acogera el nuevo y maravilloso dia de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Habra solo la victoria y gloria en el camino de adelante de nosotros que marchamos levantando en alto las inmortales banderas del sol con efigies del grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la parte final del discurso, el Mariscal        dijo que aprovecha la ocasion para redoblar su voluntad de continuar firmemente el camino del Songun, recorrido por el Dirigente, en aras de la patria y la revolucion coreana marchando brazo a brazo y hombro con hombro con los participantes en el banquete.
					
					El futuro maravilloso sera de nuestro pueblo, dijo exhortando a tomar mas firmemente el fusil de la revolucion para defender la felicidad y la seguridad del pueblo y la dignidad de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Al final, propuso un brindis por la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada y conducida a la victoria por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, por la salud de los comandantes de unidades combinadas y los miembros de la comandancia, presentes en el banquete, y de todos los oficiales y soldados y por el avance victorioso del poderoso ejercito revolucionarios del monte Paektu.
